Amazingly, #p2012018# is #p2111004#'s little brother! Incredible! But in all seriousness, #p2012018# was eager to help his sister out, and asked me to get #b10 #t4000068#s#k and #b100 #t4000060#s#k for him. Those are the main ingredients for the medicine.

#i4000068##t4000068# #b#c4000068##k/10 
#i4000060##t4000060# #b#c4000060##k/100
When I gathered up all the ingredients for #p2012018#, he asked me to wait for a bit.
휴우. 필리아가 오르비스를 떠난지 벌써 몇 년인지 모르겠군. 그 망할 연금술사 때문에 마가티아에까지 가 있다니... 게다가 딸까지 낳았을 줄은 정말 몰랐어. 조카가 생긴 것도 모르고 있었다니... 응? 필리아와 무슨 관계냐고? 필리아는 누나야.
필리아의 부탁이라면 물론 들어 줘야지. 약은 만들어 주겠어. 하지만 키니라는 아이의 상세가 편지에 쓰여 있는대로라면, 약을 만드는 게 쉽지는 않겠는걸... 괜찮다면, 네가 좀 도와주지 않겠어?
음... 키니를 위한 약을 만들려면... 이거 어렵군... 음... 그러니까, 루나픽시의 달조각과 50개와 페어리의 더듬이 10개를 구해와 줘. 그걸로 일단 약을 만들어 볼게.
도와줄 수 없다니, 이제와서 치사하잖아. 다시 한 번 생각해 보라고.

Hmm... I can't even remember the exact number of years it has been since #p2111004# left #b#m200000000##k. I can't believe she's all the way out to #m261000000# because of that stupid alchemist. I didn't even know that she had a daughter. I didn't think I'd ever have a niece, you know! What's my relationship with #p2111004#? #p2111004# is my sister.

Of course, if it's #p2111004#'s favor, then I'll do it. I'll make the medicine for sure. It's just that... if #p2111005#'s conditions are really as stated in this letter, then it won't be easy for me to make one that potent... If you have some time, can you help me make this?
Hmm... A medicine for #p2111005#... This is not easy... um... so, I'll need #b10 #t4000068#s#k and #b100 #t4000060#s#k. I'll use them to make one for now.
You can't help now? That's not right. You can't pull back now. Think again.

Hmm... Did you bring all the ingredients? While you were busy gathering them up, I did some preparation work so everything's set now. I'll make the medicine now, but it's going to take a while. It's not an easy one to make, so wait for a bit.
You haven't gotten them all yet! I need #b10 #t4000068#s#k and #b100 #t4000060#s#k. Don't forget it.
